contact.address: 581 Lancaster Dr SE #293, Salem, OR 97317, USA

hero.headline: Transform Your Home's First Impression
hero.subhead: Expert curb appeal services in Salem, OR, to boost your property value and create a welcoming atmosphere.

features.title: Professional Pressure Washing
features.description: Remove dirt, grime, and algae from your siding, driveway, and walkways for a spotless clean.

features.title: Expert Gutter Cleaning
features.description: Protect your home from water damage with our thorough gutter cleaning services, preventing clogs and ensuring proper drainage.

features.title: Exterior Painting & Refreshing
features.description: Enhance your home's appearance with our professional painting services, revitalizing your exterior and increasing curb appeal.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Curb Appeal Specialist did an amazing job pressure washing our home! It looks brand new. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: John B.
reviews.text: Our gutters were completely clogged, and they cleaned them quickly and efficiently. Great service and reasonable prices!

reviews.name: Emily K.
reviews.text: After the pressure washing and a fresh coat of paint, our house looks amazing! Thank you Curb Appeal Specialist!
